Order will only be processed if payment is made before cutoff time.
Available until 1 hour before cutoff time
Card payment is available to some users only. Payment can be made by other users in the same outlet with access to the feature.

We’ll update the order status shortly.
Get up to 5% rebate with every Essentials order
Essential items in the Cart will not be saved if you leave this page.
Pay via bank transfer using the details below.
Pay via PayNow using one of the methods below.
Important - When transferring, you must include the order number in the Comments field. For verification, we also require a photo/screenshot of payment confirmation.
Important - When transferring, you must include the order number in the Comments field. For verification, we also require a photo/screenshot of payment confirmation.
Or upload or scan QR code
Using your bank’s internet banking app, scan the QR code, or upload it from your phone library to pay. All details will be automatically pre-filled.
For verification purposes, upload a photo or a screenshot of the payment confirmation.
JPG, PNG files only - max 5MB each

Min. 8 characters - at least 1 lowercase and uppercase letters, 1 number, and 1 symbol/special character.
Almost done – Just enter your company information and delivery details, and you’re ready to use Zeemart!
Ready to order?\nTap here to begin
To find out more about this feature, please contact our team (More > Ask Zeemart).

This mobile number is already in use by another account
This EmailId is already in use by another account
Verification is FREE—verified companies receive rebates for Essentials orders. Simply enter the company UEN and upload its ACRA certificate.
Use tags to organise items your way
To tag your items, go to ‘Outlets’ > ‘Actions’ > ‘View Suppliers’> ‘Actions’>‘View market list’ in the Buyer Hub.
If the business is verified, you will get <font color="%1$s"> %2$s rebate</font> on future orders to this supplier.
Verified businesses receive <font color="%1$s"> %2$s rebate</font> on orders to this supplier.
What cuisine is served at this location?

If there’s already an order placed for a delivery date, subsequent orders for the same date are treated as add-on orders. Supplier will calculate minimum order value based on total amount of orders for the date.
Please check your order details and try again.
We accept a copy of your ACRA BizFile (no older than 12 months). If you do not have this, you may obtain one at www.bizfile.gov.sg.
PDF, JPG, PNG files only - max 5MB each
Use this page to upload invoices of non-zeemart
In Orders and Inventory, custom names and your own product codes will be shown (if available) instead of the ones used by the supplier.
The simplest way to order your F&B supplies
Used by thousands of restaurants every day to manage their kitchen operations
Send orders and track costs easily.
Buy with confidence from reputable suppliers.
To use this feature, upgrade this outlet’s subscription to the Premium plan by contacting our team.
To tag your items, go to ‘Outlets’ > ‘Actions’ > ‘View suppliers’ > ‘Actions’ > ‘View market list’ in the Buyer Hub.
Inventory UOM settings for %s item may have changed - tap to review.
Inventory UOM settings for %s items may have changed - tap to review.
Inventory UOM and conversion rates for these items may have changed due to catalogue updates recently.
Log in to Buyer Hub and select ‘Inventory’ to edit or confirm these settings.
Max 3 files - Uploaded images will be saved in ‘Invoices’ tab

Document will be split into individual files
Tap here to select & merge invoices with multiple pages
Suppliers with no orders from this outlet for more than 365 days will be automatically removed from this list.
Items are automatically removed from this list if they have not been ordered for more than 365 days.
Review the order settings for your suppliers
Tap a supplier to verify who should receive your orders and the supplier’s order cut off times. Once verified, your outlet can start placing orders to the supplier.
Ordering to some suppliers currently disabled.
To enable, tap here to review their settings.
Tap on any details above to edit
There are currently no order settings to review
All pending settings have been reviewed. To view the settings again, go to a supplier’s marketlist and tap the “i” icon at the top.
To order from this supplier, please verify its order settings.
You’ll be asked to confirm who should receive your orders and the supplier’s order cut off times.
You cannot create orders to this supplier yet.
An authorised user in your outlet needs to verify order settings for this supplier before you can place orders.
To make any changes, log in to the Buyer Hub, then select Outlets > Actions > View suppliers
